name: Cheesy Spaghetti & Meatballs
description: Hey, pasta pals. Rock dinnertime with this bowl full of comfort that even the fussiest kiddos can’t resist. It’s all sweet, tomatoey, cheesy goodness. Round out the meal with a cup of veggies for a perfectly balanced plate.

ingredients.name: Sun-Kissed Tomato Dip Mix or Bruschetta Seasoning

preparation: In a large pot, cook spaghetti according to package directions until al dente. Drain.
Meanwhile, in a large bowl, combine beef and 2 tbsp dip mix. Form into 18 small meatballs.
Arrange in a single layer in Round or Multipurpose Steamer (it’s OK if they touch). Cover; microwave on high for 3 min, or until cooked.

When meatballs have cooked, carefully drain and discard liquid from Steamer. Add crushed tomatoes and remaining 1 tbsp dip mix; stir to coat. Sprinkle on cheese. Microwave, uncovered, on high 2 min, or until cheese has melted.
Serve meatballs and sauce over noodles.
tips: Use the best quality crushed tomatoes you can find. If the sauce is too acidic, add a pinch of sugar, taste it, and then add another pinch, if necessary.

products.name: Sun-Kissed Tomato Dip Mix
summary: The taste of ripe summer tomatoes with every bite—just mix with two simple ingredients.

products.name: Bruschetta Seasoning
summary: An aromatic blend of basil, garlic and parsley.

products.name: Round Steamer
summary: A must-have tool for every kitchen! Our game-changing silicone Round Steamer cooks food faster and more evenly in the microwave. Bring a whole, juicy Roast Chicken to the table in 20 minutes, perfectly cook fluffy grains, baked potatoes, and tender veggies, or meal prep soups and chowders for easy weeknight meals. The possibilities are endless!

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
